name: Thai Coconut Soup Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Listen up, takeout lovers! Youâ€™ll have to taste and see, but this Thai-inspired soup recipe rivals your fave restaurant. Creamy, with a slight spice and tartness, it eats like a meal and is made using lots of good-for-you ingredients like sweet potatoes, Bok choy, and the protein of your choice. We like chicken, shrimp, or tofu.
